News.Title: Shrenik: Net Profit Plummets 99.89% in Q2 FY2025
News.Summary: Shrenik reported a 99.89% decline in net profit to Rs 0.05 crore for Q2 FY2025, down from Rs 46.96 crore in Q2 FY2024. Sales fell 47.10% to Rs 4.84 crore. Operating Profit Margin dropped significantly from 1124.04% to -3.31%.
